title.en: Suterare Koushaku Reijou wa Hatsukoi no Outaishi ni Metorareru

altTitles.ja: 捨てられ公爵令嬢は初恋の王太子に娶られる

altTitles.en: The Prince and the Abandoned Duchess

description.en: Priscilla, the daughter of Duke Roberto, has lived her whole life preparing to be crown prince Fred's wife, but on the day their marriage is to be announced, her groom disappears without a trace. As fate would have it, the man who becomes the new crown prince as well as her groom is the infamous second prince Dill who is her first love. He had turned her confession down years prior and now he coldly states that their union is nothing but a formality. Thus, Priscilla braces herself for a loveless marriage, but to her bewilderment, Dill treats her more affectionately than expected. However, discovering the intentions behind his sweet words seems to be the least of her concerns once rumors spread throughout the palace that Dill is behind Fred's disappearance. Who is truly an ally, and who is but a foe disguised as a friend? Join Priscilla on an enthralling journey of romance and intrigue as she unravels the mysteries that surround her!
description.ja:
ミレイア王国の王太子・フレッドの許嫁として育てられた公爵令嬢のプリシラ。
立派な王太子妃となるよう日々励んできたプリシラだったが、迎えたお披露目当日に彼がまさかの失踪!? 代わりに次期国王の座につき、夫となったのは黒い噂が付き纏う第二王子・ディルだった。
実はディルはプリシラが幼い頃に想いを寄せていたものの、告白を断られてしまった初恋相手。
「この結婚は形だけのものだ」と冷たく突き放してきたと思えば、時折甘い言葉を囁くディルに戸惑いを隠せないプリシラ。
そんな中、王宮内ではフレッド失踪は陰謀によるもので、ディルが黒幕だという噂が広まって――!?

(from: https://www.berrys-cafe.jp/comic/serial/n78)
